content: the neutral beauty of this crochet throw makes it a versatile fit for a variety of décor styles and color schemes it s a comfy favorite stitched in an up-to-date version of the beloved ripple pattern featuring red heart with love in any shades that inspire your creativity it adds textural interest to any setting display it in the living room or try it as an added layer of warmth in the bedroom even if the day is dreary wrapping yourself in this throw will make you feel comfy crocheted in an up-to-date version of the ripple pattern it adds textural interest to your surroundings **skill level ** easy **supplies ** * red heart® with lovetm 1 skein each * 1302 caramel a 1303 aran b 1401 pewter c and 1311 khaki d and 4 skeins 1406 stones e * susan bates® crochet hook 6mm us j-10 * yarn needle **size ** throw measures 46 x 59
